channel.title: Any suggestions?

item.title: Any suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:4, topic:410879”] case 312: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(301, 1) { c.sendMessage("you dip your cage and catch a lobster!"); c.getItems().addItem(377, 1); c.getItems().addItem(377, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(600, 10); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Cage to Fish here!"); } [/quote]

That’s exactly what I put, but I even explained it. Way to go! Good job kid.

Read full topic

item.title: Any suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[quote="+tyco+, post:1, topic:410879"]i have written this myself to go in actionhandler.java it compiles fine and server starts fine but when i click npc 312 it doesnt do anything help me or post a better version of this code lol thanks

[code] case 312:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(301, 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a Cage to fish here!”);

		} else if (c.getIems().playerHasItem(301, 1) {
				c.sendMessage("you dip your cage and catch a lobster!");
				c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
				c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
                                c.getPA().addSkillXP(600, 10);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a Cage to Fish here!");
		}[/code]

Tyco[/quote]

On this line

It shouldn’t be “else if”

Try this:

                                case 312:
                        if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(301, 0) {
                                        c.sendMessage("you dip your cage and catch a lobster!");
                                        c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
                                        c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
                                        c.getPA().addSkillXP(600, 10);

                        } else {
                                c.sendMessage("You need a Cage to Fish here!");
                        }

I hope that’s right. :S

Read full topic

item.title: Any suggestions?

item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

i have written this myself to go in actionhandler.java it compiles fine and server starts fine but when i click npc 312 it doesnt do anything help me or post a better version of this code lol thanks

[code] case 312:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(301, 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a Cage to fish here!”);

		} else if (c.getIems().playerHasItem(301, 1) {
				c.sendMessage("you dip your cage and catch a lobster!");
				c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
				c.getItems().addItem(377, 1);
                                c.getPA().addSkillXP(600, 10);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need a Cage to Fish here!");
		}[/code]
